description.zh: 本課程介紹目前各種材料的結構.性質及功能,並且就各種工程材料如金屬.高分子.陶瓷材料的製程加以討論.1. 材料科學及工程緒論.2. 原子結構及鍵結.3. 結晶構造及晶體幾何學.4. 凝固程序及結晶缺陷.5. 材料之機械性質.6. 金屬材料.7. 高分子材料.8. 陶瓷材料.9. 腐蝕.
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with the strictures, properties and performances of materials. It contains the following topics:1. introduction to materials sciences and engineering.2. atomic structures and bonding.3. crystal structures and crystal geometry.4. solidification and crystalline imperfections.5. mechanical properties of materials.6. metals.7. polymers.8. ceramics.9. corrosion.

description.zh: 本課程綜合的介紹電化學之原理與其應用.在原理方面包括離子之作用及其平衡,電解質之導電性質,界面現象,電極電位,電化學電池和電極動力程序等內容.而在應用方面則涵蓋溶液物理參數測量,電化學分析技術,電化學感應器,電鍍,表面處理,金屬腐蝕防治,電池,電透析和電合成等
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry and its applications. In the principles which includes ionic interaction, ionic equilibrium, the conducting properties of electrolytes, interfacial phenomena, electrode potentials, electrochemical cells and electrode kinetic process. For the application covers determination of physical parameters in the solutions, electroanalytical techniques, electroplating, electrochemical sensors, surface finishing, metal corrosion prevention, cells, electrodialysis, and electrosynthesis etc.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在(一)使學生瞭解重要化學品之合成原理與工業上的合成程序；(二)使學生瞭解合成反應與反應機購及工業合成程序的應用。內容包括基本合成原理，有機合成反應，無機合成反應，重要化學品之合成與利用。
description.en: Studies of syntheric principles of chemical and synthetic processes of industry. Chenmical reaction of synthesis, mechanism of chemical reaction, application of processes of industrial synthesis also included.

description.zh: 生醫材料論文探索是一門引導學生瞭解最新生物材料在組織工程上的發展與應用現況。針對進入生物醫學領域之初學者訓練論文資料收集、研讀整理、英文摘要之撰寫、及對專題表達能力之訓練。
description.en: This class will introduce students to current research topics and applications of biomaterials in tissue engineering. Students read current research papers, present the data, and learn to critique papers.

description.zh: 介紹各種精密化學分析儀器之原理及應用﹐學習組成結構之 鑑定、物種之分離及分析之工作方法。
description.en: Instruments are the tools for gathering qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter, students must develop an understanding of these tools and how they are used to solve analytical problems.

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何從化工原料合成化工產品的技術，尤其強調如何製程日常生活用品。
description.en: This course is to intruduce students to learn the synthesis technology of raw material and material related to the chemical engineering products,and to comprehend the transformation from industrial to dairy products.

description.zh: 本課程將講述生物醫學工程相關之基礎知識，包括人體結構、基礎生理學、生醫材料、生物力學、醫學電子、醫療器材、組織工程、生醫檢測等方面之概念。
description.en: This course will illustrate the fundamental knowledge in the field of biomedical engineering. The topics consist of anatomy of human, basic physiology, biomaterials, biomechanics, bio-electronics, medical devices, tissue engineering, and medical diagnosis.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming, Network analysis, Dynamic programming, Game theory, (Non)Integer linear programming, Markov chains(Markovian decision process), Queueing theory, Inventory models, Forecasting models, Decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，CAD/CAE/CAM/PDM也是資訊科技的產物，相關技術的整合與應用已普遍實踐於產品開發，藉由資訊科技建立「資料一元化」的數位設計環境，打破傳統產品開發的溝通障礙與隔閡，整合跨機能的設計團隊，達成「同步工程」的理想，才能因應全球產業快速的變革。電腦輔助技術不僅是新的設計工具，其更深層的意義是產品開發體系的整體運作與管理方式也受到此一新技術影響，需有合理合適的管理架構與設計程序配合，才能有效運用，創造出其應有的價值。本課程將先探討資訊科技的原理與發展趨勢，以及分析產品設計模式與設計活動的特質，進而瞭解資訊科技對產品開發的衝擊與影響；然後以實際案例透過數位化設計技術，有效縮短產品開發時程，實現同步工程的理想。
description.en: Information technology, which brings many changes to the commercial and industrial activities, makes the digital revolution happen in the recent era. In the field of product development, information technology through computer-aided design has been very influential as well, which has not only replaced traditional tools, but also altered the design procedures. The aim of this course is to study the method of product development in a concurrent engineering. In this course, the first theme is to review information technology and product development process to comprehend the impact of CAD on product development. The other theme, by the project practice, is to implement the techniques of concurrent engineering using CAD/CAM system on product development.

description.zh: 本課程目的係協助研究生進行有關設計及美學理論等主題之探討，並進一步解析設計美感元素之內涵，以培養學生獨立分析、評價、組織、歸納與創新之思考能力，並應用於實務設計案例之開發。
description.en: The objective of this course is to assist the graduate students to carry on the design and aesthetics theory, , and further analyzes connotation of the design esthetic sense element, trains the student independently of to analyze, the appraisal, the organization, the induction and the innovation ponder ability, and apply to products design development.

description.zh: 經由對環境問題的一般瞭解，研究現有之綠色設計政策、綠色設計管理及綠色生命週期設計。分析研究可行的方案來落實reduce, reuse 及 recycle （3R）三原則於產品設計程序之中。
description.en: A general review of environment issues and their problems followed by studies on green design policy, green design management, life-cycle design. Studies of exploring guidelines that lead to implementation of principles of reduce, reuse and recycle in process of product design.

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.zh: 公共戶外家具設計研究

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹應用於寡數據狀態時的灰關聯分析模式，並針對此理論之數學及應用層面之領域提出看法，藉此使學生瞭解在無法用統計方法處理問題時之另一種解決方法。並適用於各種專業領域。1.複習線性代數----特徵值及特徵向量2.灰色理論簡介3.距離(norm)與正規化4.非標準化距離與集合距離5.關聯度的意義與灰關聯分析的程序6.主觀、客觀權重7.權重整合8.多變數分析與單變數分析9.與其他多評準決策方法的比較10.灰關聯分析的未來發展
description.en: this subject provides an introduction to the application of grey correlation analysis for multiple attributes. And, it will propose the view on the mathematic analysis with application. The students would understood that "it have an another non-statistic method to solved MADM problem". It will include the following objectives:"Review the linear algebra----eigenvalue and eigenvector."The introduction for Norm and normalization"Objective and Subjective Weighting factors"The integral for Weighting factors"The Analysis for multiple variable and single variable."Other multiple criteria decision methodologies"The future view for development of grey correlation analysis.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

name.en: Special Topics on Surface Analysis for Materials

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD. From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 課程內容涵蓋鋼結構設計之原則及理念,設計方法之觀念與理論,鋼結構之型式及材料,拉力構件,壓力構件,梁,梁柱,接合之設計。
description.en: The contents of the course include concepts and design philosophies in structural steel design, analysis and design of tension members, compression members, flexural members, beam-columns, and bolted and welded connections.

description.zh: 使學生了解工程管理之應用範圍，並深入研習各領域所相關之管理技能與知識；並藉由範例之演算，使學生能與實務相結合，俾能有效的將管理技巧與電腦科技靈活的應用於工程現場之中。
description.en: This course helps to develop students' skills in managing construction projects. This course may be taken at different views in a construction management program with an emphasis on residential or commercial construction. Specific contents may include schedule management, job-site safety management, cost management, and related management topic in construction. Specific computer software may be used for construction project management. Students typically obtain the real experience from the practice special talk to gain real-world experience in planning and scheduling construction projects.

description.zh: 使同學瞭解土壤之基本物理性質、土壤分類及土壤之力學行為。課程內容為土壤成因、土壤基本物理性質、阿太堡限度及粒徑分析、土壤分類、土壤滲透及及滲流、土壤之壓縮及密壓作用、土壤剪力強度及剪力變形、土壤之夯實。
description.en: This course deals with (1)origin of soils (2)physical properties of soils (3)analysis and classification of soils (4)capillarity of soils and frost heave (5)permeability of soils and seepage problems (6)compressibility of soils and consolidation (7)shear strength and shear defermation of soils (8)lateral earth pressure (9)stability analysis of slopes (10)compaction of soils.

description.zh: 概論,降雨,降雨逕流模擬,水文演算,水文統計(1),無因次單位歷線,基隆河流域水文分析,21世紀台灣水利事及水文發展.
description.en: Introduction,Precipitation,Rainfall-Runoff routing,Hydrological routing,Hydrological statistics,Dimensionless unit hydrograph,Case study,Future development in hydrology(21-century).

description.en: This course will introduce the development situations of foreigner and Taiwan's construction automations. The purpose of this course is planning to let students understanding all kinds of automation techniques in construction industry, and creates the R & D capabilities for each student. Such purpose can increase the society reputation of construction industry.

After completing this course the students should be able to: 1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems,an examine their economic and technical characteristics. 2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator PV systems, and discuss their operation. 3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show its feasibility and future potential.

Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為訓練學生計算冷凍空調設備之蒸發器、冷凝器之熱傳與壓損的能力，以提升冷凍空調設備之設計能力。內容包括兩相流之流譜分析與動量方程式、兩相介面之表面張力作用、熱沸騰與冷凝等相變化之基本現象、兩相流之沸騰與冷凝熱傳性能之計算與分析、兩相流之流力現象分析與壓損之計算、蒸發器與冷凝器之熱傳增強技術等。
description.en: This course offers traning of advanced design techniques of evaporators and condensers in the HVAC & R applications.  The subjects in this course are: the two phase flow regime, analysis of momentum and energy equations for two phase flow, method of prediction of pressure drop of two phase flow, fundamental phenomena of condensation and evaporation, calculation of heat transfer coefficient of convective condensation or evaporation, heat transfer enhancement techniques for condensation and evaporation.

description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 古蹟、歷史建築和聚落為台灣地區文化資產的一部份，亦是台灣社會發展和多元文化交融的歷史見證。這些建築物表出各項的歷史價值與意義，其類型包括了史前遺址、荷西城堡、清代祠廟、墳墓、民居，以及日治時代以後的官署、學校、官舍住宅、土木設施等。本課程的目的，一方面希望讓修課同學對台灣各期建築歷史與形式風格特徵，能有清晰的架構與認識，以作為欣賞台灣古蹟的基礎；另一方面則是養成同學對身處文化環境的關心與歷史人文精神的培養。
description.en: Cultural property, historic building and settlement are the evidence of history development and multiple cultural interaction of Taiwanese society. The types of architecture include excavation, castle, temple, tomb, folk settlement before the Ching dynasty, and official building, school, house and civil engineering facility after the Japanese occupied period. This course hope to help students to understand the architectural history briefly, and get some basic skill about the formative characters of each period. Furthermore, it will train them to give more concern on the cultural environment of Taiwan.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. In class, lecture,

name.en: Analysis of the Historic Persons in Modern China

description.zh: 自國父鼓吹革命，以迄民國肇造，多少英雄豪傑活躍於歷史舞台上。對於這些時代人物的臧否、評價，實有進一步認識和了解的必要，以便在閱讀此段歷史之時，能作出正確而客觀的判斷。是以本課程擬就民國時期中，較具有關鍵且影響力較大的人物作一公正持平的介紹。此外，台灣在日據時期，亦有多位民主鬥士，不畏異族的高壓統治，竭盡所能，鼓吹新思想、倡導民主運動，其精神實在可佩，對於這些人物我們不可不知，自然亦在我們所要講授的範圍之內。
description.en: Since the revolution of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, many people have played important roles in Chinese history. They have had much influences in our country. It is essential for our students to have further knowledge about them, especiallt during the period of Japanese occupation in Taiwan. There were many people who didn't yield to Japanese control and promoted the democratic movement in Taiwan. They loved the land and tried their best to advocate new thought.In the course, we'll make detailed and accurate introductions about them. Fair understanding will make the students have objective comments about historic persons and the history of the period.

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 就人類歷史的發展而言，語言早於文字，而歌謠則是韻律化的語言，因此歌謠作為時代的見證與記錄，也早於文字，所以歌謠史可呈現最具體的歷史變革。台灣早期的原住民社會，歌謠既娛神又娛人，又具社交功能。隨著漢人農業移民的進入，在農業社會中，歌謠與詩歌、戲劇，乃至歲時祭儀密不可分；進入近代社會，都市化、工業化帶動唱片工業的發展，近百年台灣流行歌謠的發展史，反映不同世代的政治社會環境，也成了人們心情最真實的寫照。透過歌謠去回顧過去，無疑是充滿趣味與感性的。
description.en: Languages are developed earlier than written symbols in the history of human development. Songs are a rhythmic form of language. They record and reflect human histories before written symbols are invented. The history of songs can therefore best show specific historical changes. In early years of Taiwan aboriginal society, songs were used to entertain both gods and people and had social functions. As Han people brought in agriculture from mainland China, songs, poetry, and theater had closely related to sacrificial rites. In modern history, the development of recording history was driven by urbanization and industrialization. Taiwan pop songs in the past hundreds of year have reflected different political and social status in different generations and have portrayed the most truthful images in people's mind. Studying history through songs will be no doubt interesting.

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 本課程利用半年一學期的時間，培養學生學習德語的興趣，培養德語簡易聽、說、讀、寫的能力，增進認識德國及德語地區文化的特色，擴大國際視野。本課程教授基礎德語之文法，學習生活實用的德語會話，達到能以德語溝通的基本目標，並為未來之德文學習奠基。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for German language study. Students are expected to have basic German communication skills through using Audio/Video materials and through practicing in a group. It also helps students for study in Germany or study German in advance.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 本課程將使學員熟習各項品質管理的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋基礎統計使學員具備研究方法與分析技術能力，了解收集、統整和分析資料。其次，討論量化的六標準差管理相關工具及專案推行流程，以系統化思維探討問題並提出有效可行的解決對策，持續提升品質及客戶滿意。最後，介紹制度面及組織管理面的全球品管概念，闡述創造魅力品質之重要理論模型及影響服務品質關鍵因素。課程中以實務模式介紹為基礎，並配合個案分析以實例討論加強同學分析及解決實際問題的能力。
description.en: This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. Finally, the system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed. The curriculum of this class includes the introduction of empirical models integrated with case study so that the students will be strengthened in the capabilities of real world problem solving and quality improvement.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。 本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software. This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management. Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs. Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

description.zh: 時序進入Web 2.0時代，網路行銷已不再停留在發e-mail而已了 為了破除這個迷思，本課程嘗試從Web 2.0的思維，以「個案」、「實務」二個導向為主要設計，將傳統行銷與新的網路行銷做一整合，從概念、理論、實務、到重要議題詳細闡述網路行銷的各個面貌。並介紹現今網路行銷重點議題，以簡單易懂的觀念與案例，一步步引導進入網路行銷的世界。 本課程探討一對一行銷與網路廣告、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、網路金流機制、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，一對一行銷，行動商務之網路行銷、網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學有網路行銷實務規劃之能力。
description.en: The Internet is becoming an important way to market your products and services. As a business owner, it is essential to understand the benefits of marketing on the Internet and the different options and technologies available. Simply having a web presence is not enough. Creating a website for your company is only the first step. Increasing usage of the Internet reduces traditional media's effectiveness as people give up their time for other activities such as watching TV and reading newspapers or magazines to the Internet. 1.Less costly compare to traditional advertising media 2.Increased exposure, no geographic boundary for Internet users 3.More personalized ads 4.More targeted audience 5.More accurate as it can be updated timely with minimal effort and cost 6.Easier to collect and track customer information.

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"突破創新" 研發流程管理以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，研發與管理思維更要突破創新，以創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)為基礎，有效迅速解?錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。創新研發管理課程;以詳細介紹產品與服務研發流程與組織架構、產品與服務策略與規劃、確認與掌握客戶需求、產品與服務規格定義與確認、產品與服務概念開發與測試、品質與目標成本設計、產品研發流程之突破創新機會點(前端預防設計)、解決問題之創新構思問題解?法(TRIZ)等主題。瞭解TRIZ如何應用於系統化創新構思並解?矛盾問題，快速激發最可能解?指定問題之TRIZ創新原則與指導方向，解?之問題包含工程與管理策略亦適用，TRIZ管理實務案例包含研發管理、生產管理、服務業管理、專案管理。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in an innovative thinking manner for product R&D management process, including product planning, concept development, system design, detail design, testing and refinement, and ramp-up production. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 12 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, project management, service industry management, and production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students involving creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

description.zh: 本課程期透過建立學生正確的研究觀念，以培養論文研究與寫作之基礎能力。根據論文寫作方法之需求，分別從建立正確的研究態度、質性研究、探索性研究設計、研究個案探討、論文格式及研究程序加以研討，讓學生了解研究方法的本質、研究的意義、過程與方法，以及研究設計的基本概念與特性；進而瞭解如何進行質性與量化研究、資料蒐集、資料處理與統計分析，並管理研究的設計與執行程序。此外，藉由本課程促使學生能應用各種不同的統計方法及統計軟體以分析商管領域等相關資料，學習撰寫研究論文並準備口頭報告，以培養商業管理研究論文之撰寫、闡釋、解讀並評析各式研究報告的能力。
description.en: The objectives of this course are： 1. To introduce the basic concept of research methodology that applies in academic and practical research. 2. To learn the methods of conducting research processes, designing research strategies, collecting and analyzing research data, and preparing research proposals and reports. 3. To know how to obtain the required information through appropriate approaches in writing research papers and solving management problems.

description.zh: 課程主要內容如下: 1.創業前的主要功課,產業分析鎖定及環境scan 2.創業的成功失敗因素分析 3.創業前的SWOT分析 4.創業專業知識->財務規劃及理財篇 5.創業專業知識->行銷管理篇 6.創業專業知識->資訊管理篇 7.創業專業知識->生產管理及產品研發 8.創業專業知識->人力資源及組織規劃 9.企業營運計畫書撰寫 10.企業營運財務試算 11.企業創業實務篇->加盟連鎖管理(1)--(8) 12.企業創業實務篇->個店經營管理(1)-(2)
description.en: The main content of this course include: 1. Environmental analysis. 2. The key factor to successfully start an enterprise. 3. SWOT analysis. 4. Financial forecast and financial management. 5. Marketing management. 6. Informational management. 7. Manufacturing management and new product design. 8. Human resources and organization management. 9. Start-an-enterprise operating program. 10.The try-balance-sheet of starting an enterprise. 11.Case study of a famous successful joined-ventured company. 12.Case study of a famous successful new-factional enterprise.

description.zh: 以營利模式方法對企業，產業進行分析。研究宏觀經濟與企業生存的關係，以個案或個別產業為例深入研究。將研究結果應用於企業管理與投資。
description.en: Application of profit model's analytical tool to analyze an enterprise in depth. The same method is also applied to analyze an industrial sector. The objectives are to help a business in business decision making in order to improve its profitability.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了(但不限於)人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於使同學瞭解國際投資理論，認識國際資本市場、投資工具、分析架構與投資管理技巧。內容包括：國際金融環境、外匯市場、國際投資決策、國際融資決策、國際營運資金管理等。使得同學們不論是身為投資人或財務經理人，在面對全球化與多變化的金融環境下，皆能做出最佳的投資決策。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand the fundamental theory of international investment, the international capital markets, the investment tools, the analysis structure as well as the investment skills. The topics covered in this class include: international financial environment, foreign exchange markets, international investment decisions, international financing decisions, and international working capital management. After taking the course, the students should be able to make the best investment decisions under the globalized and changeable financial environment.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育哲學領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in educational philosophy. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 口語言談或書寫篇章的整段言詞構成一個意義單位，表達某種溝通意義及意圖。用詞遣字最需要的是語言運用的條理性，包括上下文高度一致以及邏輯緊密連貫。此課程將利用道地英文文章為基礎來分析英文篇章詞句中的語意架構。這種實際操作的目標在於幫助學生發展英文寫作技巧，同時也訓練思考能力。此課程可能包括以下議題： 	英語/文的合理表達方式及結構 	母語的語言/概念基模對於外語言詞表達的影響 	字彙/言詞適當性與意識型態的關係 	英文中習慣與創新的言詞模式及字彙選擇 	構成英語文溝通模式的價值與信念系統 	外語社會文化語意貼切所需之認知精確度與概念流利度
description.en: Discourse as a stretch of spoken or written language constitutes a semantic unit to convey certain communicative meanings and intentions. It demands an orderly use of language in terms of a high level of lexical cohesion as well as logical coherence. This course will employ real-world English writing as a springboard to the analysis and understanding of semantic scaffolding of a discourse. Such a practice aims to help students develop skills in English writing along with those in critical thinking. Topics to be addressed may include the following: 	The sense-making expressions and structures in English;  	The impacts of L1 linguistic/conceptual schemas on the L2 discourse; 	The lexical/discursive appropriateness in relation to ideological complexes; 	The conventional and creative discursive patterns and lexical choices in English; 	The system of values and beliefs that constitutes the English-language communication mode;  	The cognitive sophistication and conceptual fluency

description.zh: 本課程廣泛介紹社會語言學的各個次領域，目的在引導學生瞭解此領域早期的基礎研究與現代的關注議題。學生可藉此認識英語在社會上的運用以及各種社會變因對於語言運作的影響。修完本課程後，學生有能力辨認現代英語的不同語體、解釋語言使用所牽涉到的社會因素、運用社會語言學中適切的研究方法完成語言研究，並能將社會語言學的概念應用到語言教學。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive overview of sociolinguistic subcategories with the goal of introducing students to both early foundational work and current issues in this field. It provides students with valuable knowledge in the use of the English language in society and the effects of intricate social variables on language operation. Upon completion of this course, students will be able to identify the social varieties of English spoken in the present world, to explain the social factors involved in language use, to use appropriate methodology in sociolinguistics to conduct linguistic research, and to apply sociolinguistic knowledge to language teaching.

name.zh: 當代流行小說與英語教學
name.en: Contemporary Popular Fiction and English Teaching

description.zh: 當代英美流行小說,例如:帶珍珠耳環的少女,時空旅人之妻,姊姊的守護者,暮光之城系列等等,主題推陳出新,內容扣人心弦,有的反應當前的文化議題,有的表現出創新的文學想像,在在都激發著同學們閱讀原文小說的興趣.又由於小說的書寫語言為當今英語世界所使用,沒有年代隔閡,所以原文流行小說也是優良的英語學習材料.在字彙,片語,句型,段落及文章結構,到故事情節發展與深入探討主題的每個層面上,都提供了豐富的素材,供同學們學習觀摩.因此,本課程將挑選不同類型之時下英美流行小說四本,每月一本,規劃進度,在課堂上進行導讀與討論,並加強字彙,句型,與文章結構上的分析,幫助同學們在英語書寫,閱讀技巧,跨文化了解與思辨能力上,獲得最大的進步!
description.en: Contemporary popular novels originally written in English, such as the Girl with a Pearl Earring, the Time Traveler’s Wife, and the Twilight, have a strong appeal to readers worldwide, but non-native English speakers often enjoy these works in translated versions or film adaptations. To encourage our students to read these popular English novels in the original language, the instructor will choose four novels of various subject matters and use them as effective teaching materials in the classroom. The objectives are (1) to enrich students’ cultural background knowledge of the English speaking world today, (2) to cultivate students’ life-long reading habit of keeping up contemporary materials, and (3) to strengthen their critical thinking as well as language skills, especially reading and writing, through line-by-line close readings in the context and guided discussions on the narrative structures of the whole fiction.

name.zh: 通俗文化中的莎士比亞

description.zh: 莎翁與通俗文化有什麼關係呢？莎翁的作品不是難以理解嗎？欣賞莎翁的作品不需要特別的訓練、時間、與長期的投資嗎？這些問題的答案可以同時是肯定和否定的。不論您喜歡與否，在當代的文化裡，莎翁無所不在。Paul Prescott已經指出：「莎翁的蹤影並不局限於教室、大學、劇場等正式場合，而是在電影、電視、新聞小報、電玩、流行音樂、連環漫畫、及廣告等大眾媒體上到處可見。」確實，莎翁早已是無可迴避的圖像。他的語言文字、人物、劇本情節已經在通俗的大眾媒體上受到廣泛的挪用。「通俗文化中的莎士比亞」是為了有意於為了各種目的而挪用莎翁作品內容之學生，包括以「通俗莎士比亞」作為英語文教材之中小學教師，而設計之英文課程。為了瞭解，甚至挪用莎翁作品內容的複雜性與其中蘊含之永恆不變、舉世皆然的真理，我們將透過電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇等媒介，以異於傳統的反向方式間接研習莎翁作品的珍貴特質與內容，以瞭解社會大眾為了有效達成商業、文化、及政治的目的，是如何挪用莎翁作品。修習本課程的學生亦可推薦有助於未來透過通俗莎翁進行英語文教學之電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇，作為上課教材。
description.en: What has Shakespeare to do with popular culture? Are his writings not difficult and more or less inaccessible? Does it not require special training, time and long-term investment to appreciate Shakespeare? Well, the answer might be yes and no. Like it or not, Shakespeare is everywhere in contemporary culture. As Paul Prescott has pointed out, “His presence is not confined to the ‘official’ locations of classrooms, universities and theatres, but permeates popular mass media such as cinema, television, tabloid journalism, computer games, pop music, comics and advertisements.” Indeed, Shakespeare has long been an inescapable icon. His words, characters, and plots have been widely appropriated to appear across a range of popular mass media. This course is designed to introduce Shakespeare to those who are interested in appropriating Shakespeare for various purposes, including teaching and learning English through what Douglas Lanier has called “Shakespop.” To appreciate the complexit

description.zh: 本課程是針對欲深入了解自1492至今美國文學的高中教師和碩士學生所設。教材囊括以口述記錄的歷史傳說、戲劇、兒童文學或是歷史紀錄。其中部分的教材會交由學生先預習，另一部分則在課堂上演練。希望透過實際演練讓學生可以應用於他們自己的課堂上。本課程除了主要的研究論文發表，課堂上的實際演練、課堂作業以及學生參與程度都會列入評分標準。
description.en: This course is designed for the high school teacher and for any graduate student who wants a thorough background in the history of American literature from 1492 to the present. Texts may include stories recorded from oral tradition, letters, autobiography, novels, poems, short stories, plays, children’s literature, and/or historical documents. Some texts will be read outside of class; others will be read/acted in class, allowing students to come away with practical teaching ideas for their own classes. This course, instead of culminating in a major seminar paper, is graded based on sample teaching demonstrations, shorter writing assignments, and student participation.

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 此課程係提供對纖維材料加工特論之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。教學內容包括纖維、紗、織物的製造與加工方法；紡織物補強複合材料的製造與加工方法；射出、擠壓、熱壓及高溫高壓與複合成形方法；微細與超微細粒子在纖維材料上之應用；纖維材料之印染與整理加工；纖維材料在電子、航太、醫學、交通與農業材料上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of fiber materials processing and manufacturing. Lecture courses, organized on a modular basis, are provided in textiles (fiber, yarn, fabric) manufacturing and processing methods; textiles reinforced composite materials manufacturing and processing methods; injection, extrude and hot press fabricated methods; high pressure and temperature, microwave, and composite fabricated methods; use of fine and superfine particle in textile materials; printing and finishing for textiles; use of textiles in electronic, aerospace, medical, automobile, and agriculture materials ....etc.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

name.zh: 高科技專利之財產取得與應用
name.en: The obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent

description.zh: 「高科技專利之財產取得與應用」內容包括：專利的意涵與其重要法規, 專利實體審查基準, 專利審查實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵權鑑定, 專利舉發實例閱讀與分析, 專利侵害及訴訟實例分析, 專利行政救濟, 簡易專利地圖製作, 專利分析與其戰略佈局, 專利迴避應用與技術創新, 技術產權管理相關理論的熟悉與運用。
description.en: The contents of "the obtainment and application of the property of high-tech patent" comprises: the meaning of the patent and important rules of patent, patent substantive examination procedures, reading and analyzing about patent substantive examination cases, patent infringement verification, reading and analyzing cases for patent invalidation action, analyzing cases for patent infringement and litigation, patent administrative remedy, fabrication of simple patent map, patent analysis and strategy, application of patent around and technical innovation, and familiarity and exercise of related theories of technique property.

name.zh: 企業資源規劃與供應鏈管理
name.en: Enterprise Resource Planning and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 企業資源規劃系統(ERP)中之配銷、生產製造與財務模組與企業供應鏈管理的各個物流環節密不可分。本課程以供應鏈管理的角度出發，將物流管理中之各個程序與ERP系統中之各個模組結合介紹。課程中包含了SAP ERP的實機操做、系統導入規劃程序、專案管理技術與ERP個案導入案例分享。
description.en: There are three modules of the enterprise resource planning (ERP) system, including: the modules of sale and distribution, production and manufacture and finance. Each module of the ERP system is inseparable from the logistics management of supply chain management (SCM). The course is designed from the SCM perspective and integrated with the modules for ERP system. The course contains the operation instructions for SAP ERP system, the process planning of ERP system implementation, the skills of project management and the case studies of ERP implementation.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

name.zh: 雲端運算與巨量資料管理
name.en: Cloud Computing and Big Data Management

description.zh: 雲端運算是指透過網際網路進行擴充、消費或提供IT服務，因而顧客可隨時取用Web化的網路資源、軟體或資料。本課程在雲端方面主要內容包含雲端運算基本概念、雲端運算的核心技術、多人租用控制、雲端運算的服務模式、雲端運算應用架構及服務管理、雲端運算的安全/私密/信任管理議題、雲端運算的發展策略以及結論。 隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，已產生巨量的資料，如何處理與儲存巨量資料、如何從巨量資料中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與儲存巨量資料、如何將巨量資料表示圖型結構、以及如何更進一步從巨量的圖型結構進行探勘等議題。
description.en: Cloud Computing is a new model for enabling convenient, on-demand network access to a shared pool of configurable computing resources that can be rapidly provisioned and released with minimal management effort or service provider interaction. This course covers Cloud Computing: An Overview, Core Technologies of Cloud Computing, Cloud Service Models, Multi-tenancy Control, Cloud Application Architecture and Service Management, Developing Strategies in Cloud Computing and conclusion. With the development of cloud computing services and Internet services, it has generated a very huge amount of data. How to handle and store this huge amount of data and how to mine useful knowledge from the massive data have become popular research topics. The contents of this course also include how to handle and store huge amount of data, and how the massive amount of data is represented by graph structures, as well as how to further mine and other issues from the huge amount of graph structures.

The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 本課程使學生充分瞭解燃料電池專業學科基礎知識，並進一步啟發及增進學生未來能源科技發展知能。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池系統簡介、燃料電池效率及開迴路電壓、燃料電池工作電壓、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池電力傳輸、燃料電池系統分析。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basics of professional disciplines of the fuel cell, and to further inspire and enhance the knowledge of students about future energy technology. Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell system, Efficiency and open voltage, Operational fuel cell voltages, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Delivering fuel cell power, Analysis of fuel cell system.

description.en: To provide an overview of current computer technologies. Students will learn basic introductions to computer operating systems, internet software, office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc), WWW homepage programming, number system, logic gate, processor structure, and data structure.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes : 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series, 12.Ordinary Differential Equation.

name.zh: 數位信號處理器應用技術
name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

notes: 視廳教室301與四攜電一合開

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。力系的平衡、摩擦、面積與質量慣性矩、結構分析、虛功法。
description.en: Equivalent Systems of Forces, Static Equilibrium ,Area And Mass Moments of Inertia, Analysis of Structures, Methods of Virtual Work.

description.zh: 1.機工實習：車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工等。2.鑄鍛實習：鑄造或鍛造等。3.焊接實習：鈑金及氣焊、電弧焊實習。
description.en: (1) Machining Shop5 (2) Casting or Forging Shop (3) Welding Shop Students, depending on their own specialties and interests, shall choose at least two categories in one semester.

description.zh: 銜接工程圖學及基本幾何學的觀念，以繪製機械之零件圖、立體圖、剖面圖與組合圖，並能正確的標註尺度、表面加工符號及公差與配合。
description.en: Connecting the fundamental Engineering graphics and the geometrical drawing technology to mechanical parts and assembly drawings with emphasizes on mastering the intersections and development theorem, Steel Structures, Hydraulic and Fluid Systems and Related Mechanical Drawing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

name.zh: 低碳經濟與低碳社會建構

description.zh: 21世紀國際為確保環境、經濟、社會之永續發展，國際紛紛採取氣候變遷相關因應措施，低碳化已成為全球之共同趨勢。本課程將介紹節能減碳與低碳經濟及社會之國際趨勢、國際溫室氣體減量與能源安全相關法規、我國溫室氣體減量與節能相關法規等，並介紹碳足跡、碳中和等概念，由國際相關案例看我國邁向低碳經濟與社會挑戰與機會。
description.en: To ensure the sustainable development of environment, economy and society, effective measures are gradually adopted by internationals. Low-Carbonization obviously becomes a global common tendency. This course will be introduced the international tendencies of “energy saving & carbon reduction” and “low-carbon society”. It will also be introduced with related regulations of international greenhouse gases reduction, energy security, Taiwan GHG reduction, energy saving. The above concepts and latter concepts of carbon footprints and carbon neutral will be introduced with international practical cases to refer to challenges as well as chances toward a low-carbon Economy and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 前言: 本課程主要為介紹現今主要名家與重要學派之設計理念與其實踐狀況，授課採講演與研討方式進行。內容: 瞭解設計相關理論與方法。 瞭解設計之方法與課題。 瞭解設計研究之寫作與閱讀方法。 方式: 由授課老師依不同時期，介紹所屬領域之理論、方法及參考文獻。授課方式，採講義、討論、參觀及邀請演講等方式綜合進行。為
description.en: he content of this course is to introduce the design philosophy and implementing skills of contemporary noted architects and major schools. This course will be carried on by lecturing and seminar.

description.zh: 先修課程︰熱傳學本課程主要針對冷凍系統隔熱與熱傳技術作更深入探討，學生以修習過大學部" 熱傳學" 三學分之課程，本課程主要闡述︰1. 熱傳導理論2. 隔熱材料性質3. 真空保溫技術4. 真空保溫材料性質5. 冷凍系統隔熱設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of insulation technology for a refrigeration system.The course includes the following subjects:1. Theory of heat conduction 2. The property of insulation materials3. Outline of vacuum insulation technology  4. The property of vacuum insulation materials5. Design of insulation for refrigeration systems.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本門課主要簡介各項再生能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of renewable system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.

name.en: Fire Safety and Smoke Control Technology

description.zh: 先修課程︰流體力學、熱力學本課程主要針對建築物防火及排煙技術作深入探討，主要闡述︰1. 火災動力學2. 防火材料性質3. 排煙技術4. 防火排煙設備5. 防火材料及設備測試6. 建築物防火排煙設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of fire safety and smoke control technology for buildings.The course includes the following topics:1. The outline of the dynamics of a fire2. The property of fire safety materials3. The smoke dynamics and smoke control technology4. The facilities for fire safety and smoke control.5. Testing of materials and facilities for fire safety and smoke control.6. Design of a fire safety and smoke control system for a building.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制，數值控制，幾何資料處理，進給驅動器，NC機器的位置量測系統，自動化加工的機器監視與診斷，電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
description.en: Principles of machine design. Special design considerations in precision machinery. Static dynamic, and thermal analysis of structural members of machine. Analysis of sub-unit of machine like spindle unit, power drive unit, feed drive unit, and control system, etc. Accuracy and performance evaluation of machine, Case study with special emphasis on machine tool.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

name.zh: 生醫植入晶片系統實務
name.en: Special Projects on Biomedical Integrated System

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供修課學生對於生醫植入晶片在實務上的設計與應用。利用晶片植入系統擷取動物的生理參數或用以治療疾病，瞭解生理參數所代表的意義，以及設計新的生醫晶片系統架構來提昇目前的醫療技術。
description.en: The object of this course is to provide students for learning the special projects on Biomedical integrated system. Using the system to capture the animals' physiological parameters or to treatment diseases, and understand the meaning of these physiological parameters. Moreover, some techniques can be developed for improving the existing technologies.

description.zh: 1.軟體工程簡介2.專案規劃3.系統需求分析4.系統設計方法5.程式設計方法6.程式與系統測試7.系統維護方法
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Projest Planning3.Requirements Analysis4.System Design 5.Program Design6.Program & System Teoting 7.System Mainterance

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course focuses on three major areas: 1.The environment of global markets and cross-cultural comparison.2.Assessment of global market opportunities and threats.3.Development and implementation of global marketing strategies.

description.zh: 市場分析是現代經營管理人才不可缺少的分析技術，亦是現代企業制定行銷策略與經營管理之重要依據。本課程旨在於教導學生如何運用科學方法分析中國大陸市場之特點及運行規律。由個體角度探討大陸生產者與消費者從事市場活動之行為模式，從總體方面探討企業在大陸特殊政治、經濟、社會、文化情勢下所面臨的潛在機會與挑戰。本課程除介紹市場分析之基本方法，亦將搭配個案分析，藉由跨國企業在大陸市場成功之發展策略反觀大陸市場之重要特色。
description.en: The course of Market Analysis  is a necessary skill for people who are engaged in modern business management. It is also the important basis by which an enterprise makes its marketing strategy and operates the business. The objective of this course is to guide students to analyise the characteistics and rules in China market by scientific methodes . In microscopic way, we research the economic behavior of producers and consumers in China market. In macroscopic way, we discuss the potential chances and challenges the enterprises need to face. This course not only introduces fundamental way to analyse China market, but also adopts case study to prove the results concluded from the analysis.

description.zh: 本課程講述瞭解國際標準驗證之觀念。國際標準驗證目前有一般通用的項目，如ISO9001:2008、ISO14001:2004、OHSAS18001:2007等各種類型；另外專業方面如資安為ISO27001，食品安全為ISO22000等。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of confirmation of international standard. The general purpose of confirmation of international standard including ISO9001, ISO14001, and OHSAS18001, the other is professional field, such as information safety (ISO27001), foodstuff safety (ISO22000).

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。本課程目的在介紹蓬勃發展中的微機電系統(micro-electro-mechanical systems, MEMS)工程與最新應用。其內容包括 : MEMS之概念與特性、微觀設計原則、跨領域模擬分析、加工材料分類、主要製程技術介紹、CMOS-MEMS整合製造、封裝與測試技術、微感測器與微致動器、智慧型元件與SOC、工程應用實例介紹
description.en: The course contents include concept and characteristics of MEMS, principles of micro system design, inter-disciplinary simulation and analysis, materials for MEMS, main-stream MEMS processing technologies, CMOS-MEMS process integration, package and test techniques, micro sensors and actuators, smart devices and SOC, and closure with a number of engineering applications.

description.zh: 講授各種電機機械的工作原理及特性，內容包含：磁路分析、變壓器、旋轉電機原理、直流機、多相感應馬達、單相感應馬達、同步機、伺服及步進馬達。
description.en: To teach the principles and characteristics of electrical machinery, this course includes the subjects of analysis of magnetic circuits, transformers, principles of rotating electric machinery, direct-current machines, multiple-phase induction motors, single-phase induction motors, synchronous machines, servo and step motors.

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式/程序與屬性/組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10.記憶體設計 11.特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解衍生性金融商品的理論與實務，進而瞭解如何控管其所衍生之風險：1.期貨市場2.期貨合約3.期貨合約定價策略4.避險5.選擇權6.風險管理
description.en: We provide students with the theory and practice of derivatives that would help them to manage risks.1.	Futures market2.	Futures contract3.	The pricing of futures contract4.	Hedge5.	Options6.	Risk management

description.zh: 針對企業管理不同的對象，如經營策略、經營文化、事務管理、預算管理等，以實際個案方式介紹並討論。
description.en: This class will introduce and discuss the application on the following topics: Business strategies, business culture, factory management, and budgeting management.

description.zh: 讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券(股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權的投資，以及證券的評價模式和CAPM等訂價模式說明。
description.en: The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security. Future option and CAPM Models.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study.

name.en: Design Theory and Research in Germany

description.zh: 赴德研習之準備課程；科學理論、計畫理論、傳播理論、美學等創新設計實務相關之理論與研究，以建立專案研發設計之理論基礎。
description.en: This course provides theory and research of design in Germany related topics on Science Theory, Plan Theory, Communication Theory, Esthetics etc. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and simulation verification.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位工廠。數位製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位製造概論、數位製造實例說明、商業模型分析、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站。
description.en: Brief: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc

description.zh: 風險評估、風險管理及風險政策等工具已成為現代社會管理人類活動和產品造成的環境及健康問題。本課程的目的為培育跨領域了解環境風險及利用自然科學及社會科學的觀點和方法進行管理。同時包含探討環境風險評估管理所用的方法、相關理論和假設，並了解其作用。
description.en: Risk, assessment, risk management and risk governance have become key concepts in modern society's attempts to manage environmental and health problems connected with human activities and products. The object of this course is to train an integrated interdisciplinary understanding of environmental risks and their management by perspectives and approaches from natural and social sciences. This course also critically examines the role of risk assessment in environmental management by checking the methods used, as well as the underlying theories and assumptions.
